definitions.definition: constituting number nine in a sequence; 9th.
each of nine equal parts into which something is or may be divided.
the ninth finisher or position in a race or competition.
the ninth and final inning of a regulation baseball game.
examples: he was rocked for five runs in the ninth

definitions.definition: an interval spanning nine consecutive notes in a diatonic scale.
the note that is nine notes higher than the tonic of a diatonic scale or root of a chord.
a chord in which the ninth note above the root forms an important component.
